channel.title: Website on Northendlab | Creative Blog Template
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Northendlab | Creative Blog Template

item.title: WordPress on Google Cloud Platform
item.description: I am going over hosting WordPress on Google Cloud Platform in this article. This is a step by step guide on how to set up and host a WordPress website using a fresh installation.

item.title: Optimizing Apache Memory Usage using mpm prefork
item.description: This guide goes over optimizing apache memory usage by configuring mpm prefork module to the best values for your server. Afterword, you should notice substantial increases in performance especially if you are using free micro instances from Google Cloud or AWS.

item.title: The Perfect htaccess for WordPress
item.description: This walks you through what your htaccess should look like in a WordPress Installation. I am a minimalist and believe you shouldn’t be using a ton of plugins that slow down your install when most of what you are looking to accomplish can be achieved with this file.
